Master Selsia:
Eliminate the Crimson Lady and retrieve the Giants' Research Documents.
We must now allow secrets concrning our race to fall into other hands.
The Crimson Lady is being guarded by Timak Orcs and Timak Ord Archers at the Timak Outpost.
Slay the Timak Orcs and Timak Orc Archers and you will not doubt find her.
This is not easy task, but I believe in you...
Good luck to you!
